scripts.test:e2e: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/working-smoke-test.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:reset: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/full-episode-flow-with-reset.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:lifecycle: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/complete-episode-lifecycle.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:comprehensive: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/comprehensive-episode-test.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:build: npm run generate-build-info && npx expo run:ios --configuration Debug
scripts.test:e2e:suite: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/test-suite.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:suite:full: npm run test:e2e:build && npm run test:e2e:suite
scripts.test:e2e:all: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/
scripts.test:e2e:start-end: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/start-end-episode.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:intensity: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/log-intensity-readings.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:medication: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/add-log-medication.yaml
scripts.test:e2e:details: export JAVA_HOME='/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' && export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test .maestro/view-episode-details.yaml
